tool_description: Product Search API Using Barcode for Amazon API
name: amazon-product-search-api
title: amazon-product-search-api

api_list.name: Amazon Product Search
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://amazon-product-search-api.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "amazon-product-search-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://amazon-product-search-api.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "amazon-product-search-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
